name: SAY HELLO TO LAMPUNG, BEACH!
description: "OUR" trip will be special because we do it together as a friend offcourse! And well, There are a lots of spot that will makes you fall in love with Lampung, if you love adventure you can surfing, snorkling and diving, if you love nature and want to relax you can just swimming and seeing how amazing the sea is or you can fishing if you the "patient" type! At the end, no matter what, it'll be special because we will enjoy our trip together
